name: Jimmy Cash
dialogue: Congrats Mayor Gatberg on winning the election!
My name is Jimmy, and I'll be your financial adviser
There's little you can build and execute without cash these days
It is my job to help you grow this town into a thriving economy!

name: Money
dialogue: This metric represents your town's money.

name: Allena
dialogue: Hey there, I'm the people's representative at the Ministry for the Environment
If there is rampant development and the environment is harmed it could also cripple the town
I'm here to make sure our environment is protected and our town is safe from natural disasters.

name: Environment Health
dialogue: This metric represents your town's environmental health.

name: James the Dog
dialogue: Woof! [My name is James, miraculously you can understand me]
Woof! Woof! [Decisions you make will also impact citizens' happiness]
Woof! Woof! [If they are very unhappy, you could be voted out of office]

name: Population Happiness
dialogue: This metric represents your town's population happiness.

name: Town Requests
dialogue: This pops up from time to time, clicking on it gives you side quests you can complete along the way
Accepting these will increase your town's money. But ignoring them will decrease your town's happiness.

name: Advisory Board
dialogue: By the way, you can move the camera with W, A, S, D, zoom with Z and X and rotate with Q and E!
